**Convertible Bond — Conversion Ratio (Quiz-Utils Layout)**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
set.seed(806)
face_value <- 1000
# generate price first then implied ratio
conversion_ratio_true <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 40, sd = 3), 2)
conversion_price <- face_value / conversion_ratio_true
conv_ratio_ans <- round(conversion_ratio_true, 0)
cat(sprintf("Q: You own a bond with a face value of $%d and a conversion price of <b>$%1.2f</b>.", 
            face_value, conversion_price))
```

::: {.question-block}
<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault();" style="display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center;">

  <input type="number" id="module6_num_q6" name="module6_num_q6" step="0.01" style="width:220px;"
         data-correct-answer=`r conv_ratio_ans` data-tolerance="1" />
</form>
